Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Macropin 1 (Mac1, MAC-1, Leu-rich;  natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals, XXA)

Literature Information.Literature: First reported in a symposium in 2009.Activity: Active against B. subtilis (MIC 1.3 uM), S. aureus (MIC 3.7 uM), L. monocytogenes KCTC 3710 (MIC 25 uM), E. coli (MIC 3.0 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 6.25-35 uM), E. coli (MIC 6.25 uM(, and C. albicans (MIC 6.3 uM). Additional data fromKo et al., 2017.Toxicity: hRBC:hemo.lytic HC50 160 uM.Structure: CD suggested a helical conformation in TFE or SDS micellesMonincová et al., 2014. Updated 3/2014; 7/2021.
Literature Information.Author: Slaninová J, Mlsová V, Kroupová H, Alán L, T?mová T, Monincová L, Borovicková L, Fucík V, Cerovský V.2012
Literature Information.Title: Toxicity study of antimicrobial peptides from wild bee venom and their analogs toward mammalian normal and cancer cells.
